contentrichtext.text: '''''The Country Girl''''' may refer to: * [[The Country Girl (1885 play)|''The Country Girl'' (1885 play)]], a play by [[David Garrick]] ** [[The Country Girl (1915 film)|''The Country Girl'' (1915 film)]], a 1915 silent film, based on the Garrick play * [[The Country Girl (1950 play)|''The Country Girl'' (1950 play)]], a play by [[Clifford Odets]] ** [[The Country Girl (1954 film)|''The Country Girl'' (1954 film)]], a 1954 film based on the Odets play, starring Bing Crosby and Grace Kelly * [[The Country Girl (Hallmark)|''The Country Girl'' (Hallmark)]], a 1974 presentation in the [[Hallmark Hall of Fame]]. * ''[[The Country Girls]]'', a 1960 novel ==See also== * ''[[A Country Girl]]'', a long-running British 1902 musical *[[Country Girl (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
